thread.title: Three airstrikes on Ghazieh - MTV Lebanon
thread.title_full: Three airstrikes on Ghazieh - MTV Lebanon

title: Three airstrikes on Ghazieh - MTV Lebanon
text: Three airstrikes were recorded targeting Ghazieh, hitting empty buildings in the Zahriya and Ain neighborhoods, as well as near the Prophet Idris shrine. Additionally, an airstrike targeted the town of Arkey. Three airstrikes on Ghazieh [Previous](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490160/mp-waddah-sadek-to-mtv--there-are-traders-who-are-exploiting-the-war-and-raising-their-prices--and-it-is-the-state-s-duty--as-well-as-ours--to-assist-our-brothers--tensions-have-been-reported-among-the-displaced--and-there-is-a-lack-of-security-presence) - [MP Waddah Sadek to MTV: There are traders who are exploiting the war and raising their prices, and it is the state's duty, as well as ours, to assist our brothers; tensions have been reported among the displaced, and there is a lack of security presence](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490160/mp-waddah-sadek-to-mtv--there-are-traders-who-are-exploiting-the-war-and-raising-their-prices--and-it-is-the-state-s-duty--as-well-as-ours--to-assist-our-brothers--tensions-have-been-reported-among-the-displaced--and-there-is-a-lack-of-security-presence) - [An Israeli airstrike targeted the town of Rab El Thalathine in the south](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490165/an-israeli-airstrike-targeted-the-town-of-rab-el-thalathine-in-the-south) - [Sadek to MTV: The equation of unity among the axis of Resistance has ended, and all of them have abandoned Lebanon; today's war is a matter of strategy and timing, and the decision to go to war was made after Israel spent 20 years preparing for it, all while Lebanon was sinking deeper into corruption](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490166/sadek-to-mtv--the-equation-of-unity-among-the-axis-of-resistance-has-ended--and-all-of-them-have-abandoned-lebanon--today-s-war-is-a-matter-of-strategy-and-timing--and-the-decision-to-go-to-war-was-made-after-israel-spent-20-years-preparing-for-it--all-while-lebanon-was-sinking-deeper-into-corruption) - [An airstrike targeted a fuel station in Libbaya in the Western Bekaa](/en/News/Live_Feed/1490170/an-airstrike-targeted-a-fuel-station-in-libbaya-in-the-western-bekaa)
